p: One of the most pathogenic species of nematodes for most crops is Meloidogyne spp. A. judaica has been shown to have antifeedant (against Spodoptera littoralis) and fungicidal properties (on several pathogenic fungi), as well as the ability to determine the immobilization of the 2nd juvenile stage of Meloidogyne javanica through its essential oil components (especially piperitone and trans-ethyl cinnamate) [ 215, 216].
